title: Duckhorn Portfolio Tasting
description:
Join us for an exclusive Duckhorn Portfolio tasting at Whispering Vine Fourth St. on November 9, from 1-3 PM. For $95, enjoy a curated selection of wines from premier vineyards paired with freshly crafted passed flatbreads. Discover the rich history and distinct character of these renowned wineries:

  • Duckhorn
  • Kosta Browne
  • Paraduxx
  • Goldeneye
  • Migration
  • Canvasback
  • Sonoma-Cutrer
  • Decoy

Space is limitedâ€”reserve your spot today for this unique tasting experience!
